attributes.action: BAN THE IRA MARCH IN LIVERPOOL 18TH FEB 2012
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the proposed march on the 18th of February by sympathisers of the IRA on British soil be banned out right.These events have no place on our streets....

rejection.details: Thank you for submitting this e-petition. The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy, not individual events. So, unfortunately, we are unable to publish this particular one.
